ComicInfo.Summary:
The FWACATA Anthology is a multi-genre comic book featuring three thrilling comics in one! The anthology series will be released quarterly, the guts of it are in the same vein as Marvel Comics Presents or Dark Horse Comics Presents. The exciting sequential stories come from Cuban-Mexican-American Juan Navarro, creator of Zombie Years, Vigil, and co-creator of Tommy, published by Creature Entertainment.
What will you find inside the pages of Fwacata? See for yourself, true believer! MEATHOOK Every comic creator I know has that character they made when they were young and starting out, and for me, this big ol lug with claws has lived in my head since High School. In a world of superpowers, the last thing you will find is a hero. The struggle or real and Meathook is here to make a difference, it’s. A story about Life, love, death, and invulnerability! It’s Wolverine meets Miami Vice written by Tarantino in this raucous superhero story! REZ After an occult accident, disgraced ex-police detective John Reznick has returned to the edge of death with access to his past lives! He used this to solve crimes and atone for his past life, both current and from before as Rez! It’s Dark magic and religious teaching wrapped in an episode of Law and Order written by Louie CK and directed by Robert Rodriguez! You know about the things that go bump in the night but what are those things that bump uglies? bad Girl comics are back with this series that gets into naked truth about the end of the world! Good and Evil, Right and Wrong, these are all on God's spreadsheet somewhere, and Marie and her group of supernatural agents are ready to act! Buffy the Vampire slayer meets John Carpenters THING written and directed by Chad Strahelski! All this and pinups and more in one issue!
